rounds.comments: (Alex: You have to name the two books by the same author that we have managed to combine in our clues.)

clues.text: "Oliver Copperfield"
"A Farewell the Bell Tolls"
clues.response: A Farewell to Arms & For Whom the Bell Tolls

rounds.text: He was the last vice president who didn't serve a full 4-year term
